::Cygnar::
    "Ah good, you're here Ramjet.  We have decided to attack the 
Trainer's base, here."  The map glows again.  "You and your 
Destrocons will team up with our large friend here to form the 
distraction."  He gestures to Klank.  "We will sneak in through a 
tunnel dug by another of our bots.  While the rest of our forces do 
that your job is to assault their base with your utmost effort to 
delay their reaction time."
